item.title: Lindsay add a quote by Anne Frank
item.description: "It's really a wonder that I haven't dropped all my ideals, because they seem so absurd and impossible to carry out. Yet I keep them, because in spite of everything, I still believe that people are really good at heart." -- Anne Frank

item.title: Lindsay add a quote by Anne Frank
item.description: "How wonderful it is that nobody need wait a single moment before starting to improve the world." -- Anne Frank

item.title: Lindsay add a quote by Sigmund Freud
item.description: "Civilized society is perpetually menaced with disintegration through this primary hostility of men towards one another." -- Sigmund Freud

item.title: Lindsay add a quote by B. F. Skinner
item.description: "We shouldn't teach great books; we should teach a love of reading. Knowing the contents of a few works of literature is a trivial achievement. Being inclined to go on reading is a great achievement." -- B. F. Skinner
